text: Jim Sanderson (born c. 1939) is a former American football coach. He served as the head football coach at California Polytechnic State University in San Luis Obispo, California from 1982 to 1986, compiling a record of 26–27. Sanderson worked a defensive assistant at Cal Poly before being named the head coach. ==Head coaching record== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Cal Poly Mustangs football coaches
title: Jim Sanderson (American football)
